meta.title: Setup PostgreSQL database schema and migrations

task.role: You are a Senior Security Engineer with expertise in authentication and secure coding. Implement Task 2 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create database schema for teams, users, tasks, and authentication with sqlx migrations
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

requirements.description: 1. Create sqlx migration files in migrations/ 2. Define users table: id (UUID), email, name, created_at, updated_at 3. Define teams table: id (UUID), name, description, owner_id (FK), created_at 4. Define team_members table: team_id (FK), user_id (FK), role (enum), joined_at 5. Define tasks table: id (UUID), team_id (FK), title, description, assignee_id (FK), status (enum), due_date, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at 6. Add indexes for performance on foreign keys and status fields

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-2): Setup PostgreSQL database schema and migrations

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Run migrations with `sqlx migrate run` and verify all tables created with proper constraints and indexes
